metadata.name: ELYSIUM
metadata.description:
For centuries, sculptured rice terraces have dominated vast expanses of land across South-East Asia.  

Situated at the heart of the Indonesian archipelago, lies the mystical island of Bali where manicured landscapes of verdant hues, lapped by swaying palms, are synonymous with its reputation as a tropical paradise.   

Not only does the existence of the terraces play a huge part in the agriculture of the island, they are a physical manifestation of the ancient Balinese Hindu philosophy “Tri Hita Karana” that explores the harmony between God, Nature and its People.

‘Elysium’ is a Genesis Edition piece by Tom Morris 

Artwork Title:  Elysium  
Artist:  Tom Morris (Colourwrks)  
Edition:  50 | 50  
Price:  0.030Ξ  
Capture Date:  28 October 2021  
Capture Location:  Ubud, Bali, Indonesia
